_header: If a young woman had a hundred men take
Title(s): ‘A good medesyn yff a mayd have lost her madenhed to make her a mayd ageyn’
_description: ‘A good medesyn yff a mayd have lost her madenhed to make her a mayd ageyn’ — 34 lines in irregular stanzas

A copy of copy of 
            Caxton, William, trans., The Myrrour of the Worlde, [Caxton, 1481]
